title: Silent No More
description: There is an alternate cover edition for this ASIN here.Warning: The material in the book is indented for adult readers only, age 18+. This novel contains graphic sexual content, graphic violence, and harsh language.  Shannon Taylor thinks she has the picture perfect life.  Engaged to marry her college boyfriend and a best friend whoâ€™s more like a sister, life is almost perfect. That is until her world is tilted by two of most important people in her life.  A chance encounter leads Shannon down a path that will force her to confront a past she has meticulously ignored for ten years.  Nicholas Lockhart, renowned bachelor, has a reputation for his cold eyes and icy heart. Meeting a woman who can turn is world upside is not in the cards; that is until Shannon.  When Shannon's world crashes, she wonders if it's possible to crack Nick's icy heart. A web of lies and twisted truths soon leaves both bare and vulnerable.  Silence no longer offers her protection or safety.  Will remaining silent cost Shannon the real love she's finally found? Or will she stay silent no more?
author: N.E. Henderson
